_header: O Criste rex gencium / Whose kingdom hath none end
Subjects: Christ, attributes of; hymns, to Christ
_description: James Ryman, a version of the hymn ‘O Christe rex gentium’ — three quatrains

CULEe112.First Lines:
O criste rex genciumSittyng in heuen
                    trone…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Nos salua cum clemen[cia]ffro peyn thatt endles
                    y[s]
